body: When a rogue with this talent fails a Climb check by 5 or more, she can immediately make another Climb check at the surface's base DC +10. If successful, she stops her fall by clinging onto the surface. The rogue does not take falling damage when she stops her fall in this manner.
name: Nimble Climber
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Rogue/Rogue Talents/Nimble Climber
